name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 2 - Flandre Scarlet/Komeji Koishi/Aki Minoriko/Tsukumo Yatsuhashi/Yorigami Jyoon
summary: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Flandre Scarlet, Komeji Koishi, Aki Minoriko, Tsukumo Yatsuhashi and Yorigami Jyoon. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.
